Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: As most lecturers tend to say more than the required content related to tasks, using GenAI can help me identify the specific parts and areas I need to focus on, without spending time searching through the materials. Mistakes in GenAI can also improve my learning as I am critically thinking and reading the generated content, comparing it to class materials.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Generally, teaching feedback needs to be more specific. Sometimes to the point where I don't know where to start fixing the problem I have.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedbacks from classes also take weeks, whereas AI can be instant. But GenAI isn't always as reliable as feedback from teachers
